Sentencas: A bilayer composite electrolyte comprising BaCe0.85Y0.15O3-d (BCY15) - Gd0.2Ce0.8O2-d (GDC20) at the anode side and BaZr0.85Y0.15O3-d (BZY15) - Nd0.1Ce0.9O2-d (NDC10) at the cathode side is designed for improving the stability of co-ionic conducting solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) in a cell imbalanced stack.
Titulo: Design concept of co-ionic conducting solid oxide electrolyte for stable operation in a cell-imbalanced fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Contrary to the single layer structured SOFCs, the bi-layer cell stably operates without electrode delamination under negative voltage conditions.
Titulo: Design concept of co-ionic conducting solid oxide electrolyte for stable operation in a cell-imbalanced fuel cell stack

Sentencas: We measure local internal p(O2) values using embedded Pt probes.
Titulo: Design concept of co-ionic conducting solid oxide electrolyte for stable operation in a cell-imbalanced fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Based on these values, local electronic conduction is estimated in combination with four probe DC conductivity measurements.
Titulo: Design concept of co-ionic conducting solid oxide electrolyte for stable operation in a cell-imbalanced fuel cell stack

Sentencas: It is found that ntype conductivity (similar to 10 (-3) Scm(-1)) and p-type conductivity (10(-5)-10(-4) Scm(-1)) are developed in the BCY15GDC20 near the anode side and in the BZY15-NDC10 near the cathode side, respectively.
Titulo: Design concept of co-ionic conducting solid oxide electrolyte for stable operation in a cell-imbalanced fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The results indicate that local electronic conduction in electrolyte regions near both the anode and cathode interfaces is a crucial factor for the durability of co-ionic SOFCs under negative voltage operation.
Titulo: Design concept of co-ionic conducting solid oxide electrolyte for stable operation in a cell-imbalanced fuel cell stack

Sentencas: We therefore suggest the bi-layer configuration as a practical solution to protect co-ionic SOFCs in a cell-imbalanced stack.
Titulo: Design concept of co-ionic conducting solid oxide electrolyte for stable operation in a cell-imbalanced fuel cell stack
